1000000111101110 0111100010011010 1 -> sum: 1111101010001001, cout: 0
0001001111011001 0111111101111100 1 -> sum: 1001001101010110, cout: 0
1011011110101011 1110111111100111 0 -> sum: 1010011110010010, cout: 1
